website_summaries.verdict: The bristles on this hard-plastic building set are easier to fit together than magnets, so they're perfect for younger children with chubby fingers.
pros: Interlocking bristles fit together to create a variety of shapes
Easy to connect and take apart
Blocks come in a variety of shapes and colors
Older kids may enjoy playing with them as well
cons: Sometimes takes a lot of strength to push the bristles together

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Motor MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this set for my kindergarten classroom. We begin each day of school with 15 minutes of fine motor play, and these Bristle Blocks are always a favorite! I purchased a second set for my little boy at home, and he loves them just as much! I have done extensive research on fine motor weakness, which may be a result of too much screen time and not enough fine motor play opportunities. This product is a fun and engaging way to make fine motor play part of everyday! -Casey S.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Grandma's House
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim to keep at my house for my grandson (now 15 months old) when he's over. Love these? Great for little hands just developing their fine motor skills and soft for grandmas who might step on them by mistake. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: Fun Tiles for Kids who enjoy Creating
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son enjoys building with these. They are pretty easy to use and provide opportunities to explore creativity. I recommend them for younger children and probably up to 5 or 6 years of age but I think older kids may enjoy them as well. The amount of tiles is good and they are sturdy. I enjoy that there are many ways to use the tiles. My son has made toy dogs out of them and cars. It is fun to see what he will create with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cali girl

customer_reviews.title: Brings out the child’s imagination
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tiles for my three-year-old grandson. I’ve never seen him so excited. He immediately opened up the box and took out all the tiles and started making a digger truck. I was so amazed. Every time he comes over he goes straight to where I keep the tiles and sits on the floor and is busy for hours. I love how the tiles bring out my grandson’s imagination. The tiles are very strong and sturdy. They fit together perfectly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: vickkay

customer_reviews.title: Get this and their magnetic one too
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety of options and colors. My daughter is 28 month old and loves this and the magnetic ones this brand sells. I'm 37 and I'm having just as much fun. My niece is 8 and enjoys too. I love these so much I bought a second one to give away as a birthday gift the dad of the three year old was right in there building airplanes with spinning choppers.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and variety of pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best deal i found. The pieces are great quality. Bright and slightly bendy to link together and stay together well. Comes with wheels to make cars and lots of fun sizes. Highly recommended. My 1, 4 an 7 year olds highly enjoy
customer_reviews.author: puppluv87Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Picassotiles Oh How We Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Picassotiles are awesome. My 4year old son really enjoys building things with these and when the grandchildren come over they all have fun. Highly recommend it will keep your little one’s busy while you get things done around the house 😊
customer_reviews.author: MrsFee45

customer_reviews.title: Adults love them too! Good way for guys to bond w babies.
customer_reviews.text: My baby niece love them as do all the adults in her world.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to build with
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my toddler thinking they would “stick” together to build with. They are actually very difficult to build with and he cannot do it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylene N Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not good for under 3 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: These blocks bend very easy and seem soft. It was way to hard for my grand daughter to put together without frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Picasso Tiles are excellent for the imagination of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson but couldn’t wait for him to see it. I opened it and made a helicopter, a monster truck and a high rise tower and sent him pictures. I love these tiles so much more than other brands. We all love playing with them. What an excellent gift this would make for Christmas! I highly recommend Picasso Tiles for all ages. It’s an excellent game for the imagination!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 6 year old grand kids love playing with these. The first thing they asked me though was...where are the instructions like Legos? Kids are creative but also like to follow instructions. Please consider this to the company. For this reason I'm only giving 4 stars and will not order more to add to these toys.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not Monet.
customer_reviews.text: When I was growing up we called these bristle blocks. I get that. Picasso never did anything with blocks. I mean I guess he had that whole cubism thing going on. Where was that Picasso? I mean I definitely saw cubes in his stuff... Anyway these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Awesome building blocks 👍
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is autistic and this was a big hit with her! It's hard to get her to sit and focus. She will build with these for hours !!
customer_reviews.author: Cande

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 4 year old and 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: These are a great option for our 4 year old who is over mega blocks and our 2 year old who isn't ready for legos!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Good present for a toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my three-year-old great nephew. I heard from his mom that he (and she) like the Tiles and are enjoying them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I own a daycare and found that these are a live saver. Great quality also! They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: My boys love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. My sons love building and making "towers". Durable and great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bratcher

customer_reviews.title: keeps him busy
customer_reviews.text: Our son is special needs and these just keep him really occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Hours of use
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids of all ages! My 8 year old down to my 15 month old can sit and build with these for hours! It helps with their motor skills and I love that they have so much fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays with these DAILY! I bought them as a science learning tool for home schooling. She has built so much. GREAT GREAT GREAT learning toy/tool!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie O

customer_reviews.title: One of my 2 year old favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how excited my son was when he saw this toy. He played non stop for several days. Now I can give it to him and it will keep him busy for couple of hours. Highly recommend this toy
customer_reviews.author: Sergii

customer_reviews.title: Great for imagination
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1.5 year old, to work with motor coordination. My husband made a car and thats all he wanted. He wouldn't stop playing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nubia C. Forero Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love Picasso products my kids have played with them everyday for two years now my son wanted to get the Bristol blocks so we got them for him. The only down sid was the packaging was bent but blocks were fine
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: these are good
customer_reviews.text: They are very sturdy and the kids liked it very much. I recommend them for other kids 3-5 years of age.
customer_reviews.author: e.k.

customer_reviews.title: A gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and he loves them. They are easy for him to use and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool for toddler
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2yr old really likes playing with these, easy for him to use and build/play with
customer_reviews.author: BohnertFam

customer_reviews.title: Great building toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 6 year old grandchildren immediately started playing with this. And did not want to stop. Thank you for this brightly- colored and creative-play toy!
customer_reviews.author: Marion N.

customer_reviews.title: Bright, Colorful, fun
customer_reviews.text: Will probably buy another set when the great granddaughters are a little older, they are not quite two.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Tolman

customer_reviews.title: As fun now as it was 40+ years ago!
customer_reviews.text: This toy takes me back to my childhood. My grandson has as much fun with it as I did!
customer_reviews.author: ischrasa

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my cousin's two-year-old daughter after excitedly recognizing these from my own childhood (I'm 30 now). Girl is obsessed with these just like I was!

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice and safe fine motor toy for any kid
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice and safe fine motor toy for any kid

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had something similar when I was a kid This one is advanced with the extra pieces the kids loved it My only comment is that I wished there are some shapes in a catalog so kids can look and create
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Alkhatib

customer_reviews.title: Great non tech, throwback toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons (2 and almost 6) loved these. I remembered buying bristle blocks for my son (now 40) when he was a kid, but I hadn’t seen them for sale in recent years. Super creative toy. Very simple, non tech toy to build kids’ imaginations.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Uzureau

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love playing with my 4 year old and 2 year old with these. In about a month my 4 year old has learned to develop more and more complex constructions all by herself. They've had both paint on them and dried play dough but easily came clean. A great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SlickRicK954

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I dont know who loves these more, my husband or my daughter. They are quality and fun for hours. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great quality, a good quantity and nice variety of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michcafa

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old toddler loves his new building blocks. Lots of different shapes and he can actually build something without help. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Colors are super bright! Easy to clean, thick and durable. These will last for ever!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old grandson loves it. We have a great time building things together. As he gets older I am sure he will continue to play with them. I enjoy them as well. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tannenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: bought these for our 2 year old and 5 year old grandkids. They LOVED them! We even got into "building" with them. They arrived sooner than expected. It's one of the first toys they go for to play with when they come over to our house. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mjh

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My daughter loves to build with these. She doesn’t touch her Legos at all. This is so easy for toddlers to learn how to build things with blocks
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Great building blocks - easy to use and do not come apart easily which makes them great for two year olds. Great for two year olds and up.
customer_reviews.author: SKahill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 1/2 year old Grandson really enjoyed these tiles. He has the magnetic tiles at home, and I wanted something different for his visit with us. I knew we could count on the Picasso name, and we were not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy and easy to build with for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My three and a half year old loved these and plays with them everyday.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Kids love them they have them at school so I felt they should have them at home too... They’re able to build so many things it keeps them busy

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday boy
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my boyfriends nephew. He was exited to open and play with it. His older brother even joined in to play. Overall happy with the quality of the product. Will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: liliana b.

customer_reviews.title: We bought two packages of them which seemed a good amount for a couple kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren, ages 3 and 4, opened these on Christmas morning and started building immediately. Very satisfying to them and an outlet for endless creativity. We bought two packages of them which seemed a good amount for a couple kids.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: These tiles really spark my 4 year old daughter’s creative side. It’s fun for the whole family and is great for family bonding. You get a lot of pieces, so you get a lot for your money. We like these tiles more than LEGO’s because you can connect the pieces in so many different ways. However, some of the pieces do fit loosely so they fall apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wei

product_meta.title: PicassoTiles PTB120 120pcs Bristle Shape 3D Building Blocks Tiles Construction Toy Set Learning Playset STEM Toy Set Educational Kit Child Branin Development Preschool Kindergarten Toy
product_meta.description:
Features
- PTB120 are soft, rubbery, interlocking bristles that stick together at any angle makes it easier to build.
- PTB120 provides a good way to develop children's creativity at a young age. Your children can acquire a strong sense of color, geometrical shapes, & architectural design.
- PTB120 bristle block set has a different brightly colored piece which provides kid's endless building possibilities.
- PTB120 bristle block set can build different objects such as a car, a house, a robot. 

DREAM BIG & BUILD BIG- No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create a masterpiece. PicassoTiles in colossal styles.

LEARNING BY PLAYING- Never too early to start developing kids creativity. Children can acquire a strong sense of color, geometrical shapes including 3D forms, numbers, counts & architectural design at an early age.

BONDING BY PLAYING- Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel a sense of achievement together. Suitable for all ages (3 and up) by one party or in groups. A great way to spend quality time with the family and loved ones.

LEARNING IS FUN- Encourage creativity which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environment. Fun and entertaining; perfect educational present for school age children that will never go out of style.

CREATIVITY BEYOND IMAGINATION- 3D Bristle Shape Building Blocks for preschool, pretend play and more. Easy to construct and easy to put away for storage. 

BPA FREE & NON-TOXIC - Child safe and lead safe

THERAPEUTIC - Release the children from the electronic devices and digital screen such as TV, gaming, smartphone or tablets which could be harmful to children eye visions

Recommended Age- 3 years and up

In The Box - PicassoTiles PTB120 Bristle Shape 3D Building Block Set (120 Pcs)
feature_bullets: FRUSTRATION-FREE BUILDING - PicassoTiles bristle shape blocks offer easy connectivity and simple to disconnect to maximize fun and build more creative designs. PTB120 enables children to improve hand-eye coordination, gain a strong sense of color, counting, sorting, attention, promotes the child brain development, and focus by using their hands to foster Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math skills

EDUCATIONAL TOY - Never too early to start developing kids' creativity. Children can acquire strong sense of color, structures, geometrical shapes including 3D forms, numbers counts, & architectural design at an early age. No limitations, scalable to build as big as desired by adding more pieces to create the masterpiece. The 120pcs bristle shape building block can build more than 20 creative designs. Bristle shape block construction toys have different add-on pieces to offer open-ended

LEARNING IS FUN - Encourage creativity for STEM (science, technology, engineering, art, and mathematics) education which is the key factor to success in today's ever-changing environment. Fun and entertaining; perfect educational present for school age children that will never go out of style. Bristle shape building blocks are designed fosters hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills of all ages including preschool, group activity, classroom teamwork, and kindergarten

FUN FOR EVERYBODY - PicassoTiles bristle shape blocks encourage children (3+ and up) and/or families to work together as a team to design the masterpiece structures and build the creations. Entertaining for single or multiple parties and feel the sense of achievement of building together. A great way to spend quality time with the loved ones for family time bonding by playing. Developing kids creativity and STEAM (science, technology, engineering, art, and mathematics) skills

HIGH-QUALITY & NON-TOXIC - Each piece of bristle shape blocks is manufactured by high-quality, toxic-free, and lead safe material with the highest standards to ensure the safety of the children. PTB120 is constructed from the highest quality materials to ensure it's strong and sturdy. Bringing you and your family, fun, and excitement for years to come
